Bookmarks: Write a message or draw a picture on a playing card and use it as a bookmark to mark your place in a book.
DIY Photo Frames: Transform playing cards into miniature photo frames by attaching a small photo to the back of the card and decorating the edges with paint, markers, or other embellishments.
Game Coasters: Use playing cards as coasters to protect surfaces from water marks and spills. You can also decorate them with a protective clear coat to make them more durable.
Bookmark Holder: Create a simple bookmark holder by attaching a small playing card to a bookend or a piece of cardboard, and use it to hold your bookmarks.
Gift Tags: Use playing cards as gift tags by writing a message on the card and attaching it to a gift with a small ribbon or string.
